rukus.text: Öebbi i Inuben fellawen s yill; ipcali, fellas, lbabuô, s lameô iS; a pnadim l$it iS. Amar a ppesnemrem
Inub fellawen s wayen akw illan deg igenwan, akked wayen illan di tmurt. Akw s$uôeS. S tidep, deg waya, d issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
Ini i wid iumnen ad semmêen i wid ur negguni ara ussan n Öebbi, iwakken ad Ikafi agdud $ef wayen keppben
Win ixedmen ayen ilhan, i iman is; win ifalîan, mgal is. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen tu$alin nnwen
Ni$ Nefka, i At Isôail, Tazmamt, ûûwab, lambiyya. Nôeéq iten s wayen ilhan. Nesmenyaf iten i imavalen
Nefka yasen abeggen si Lameô. Ur mgarraden, armi i ten id tusa tmusni, wa iqheô wa. Ih, Mass ik ad Iêudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden
Sinna, Nebbwi k deg ubrid n Lameô. Ddu degs, ur teddu akked chawi n wid ur nessin
Ih, nitni ur ak d ppawin acemma s$uô Öebbi. Imednas, ih, d imawlan wa n wa. Öebbi d Bab n wid ipêezziben
Ayagi d assekni i l$aci, d nnhaya u d aêunu i ugdud ipputebbten
Ne$ $ilen wid imôôeôen iman nnsen s tucmitin, a ten Neêseb am wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d imuddiren ne$ d lmeggtin. Dir it uêuddu nnsen
